data.text:
You can select any topic to start but if you are taking the learning for the first time we suggest you look at them in order.

Each topic has a number of screens. A page indicator shows you what screen you are on and how many pages there are in each topic.

When you exit the course your progress will be remembered. So when you return you can return to the same place if you want to.

To complete the course you'll need to pass the assessment with a score of 80% or more.

At the top of the screen are these buttons:

  • Exit - to close the module
  • Help - to open this help screen
  • Menu - to return to the main menu
  • Resources - to open a list of useful links for further information

Either side of the screen are these buttons:

  • Back - to move back a screen
  • Next - to move forward a screen
